TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ButtonBase extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
Public MustInherit Class ButtonBase Inherits Control
public ref class ButtonBase abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 实现按钮控件共同的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你通常不继承从。You do not typically inherit from . 若要创建您自己的按钮类，从， ，或类。To create your own button class, inherit from the , , or class. 若要显示的图像将派生的按钮控件，设置属性或和属性。To have the derived button control display an image, set the property or the and properties. 可以通过设置按钮控件上对齐映像属性。The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the property. 同样，若要对齐显示在按钮控件上，设置属性。Likewise, to align the displayed on the button control, set the property. 属性确定的样式和该控件的外观。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果属性设置为，用户的操作系统会确定控件的外观。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要在控件的右边缘显示省略号 (...) 以表示控件文本超出指定的控件长度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.

value.span: 如果要通过省略号指示附加标签文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`显示超出控件的宽度，当用户经过使用鼠标控件的文本。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 你必须设置的控件`AutoSize`属性`false`如果你想要`true`。You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want to be `true`. 如果`AutoSize`是`true`，控件将放大以适合文本，并且将不会出现一个省略号。If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`ButtonBase1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `ButtonBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#136](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#136)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#136](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#136)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用仅具有属性控制其是。Use the property only with controls whose is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle FlatStyle { System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::FlatStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮控件的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性和类设置为`System`、 按用户的操作系统绘制控件和基于检查对齐`CheckAlign`和属性值。When the property of the and classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and property values. `CheckAlign`属性值不会更改，但可能会受影响控件的外观。The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected. 与左或向右边缘的控件 （左或中心对齐方式显示左对齐、 右保持不变），水平对齐复选框和垂直对齐的描述性文本相同。The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text. 例如，如果你有控件替换为`CheckAlign`属性值`ContentAlignment`。For example, if you have a control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`. `MiddleCenter`属性值`ContentAlignment.TopRight`，和属性值设置为`System`，复选框对齐方式看起来处于`ContentAlignment.TopLeft`时的文本对齐方式保持不变。`MiddleCenter`, a property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`，分配给任何映像属性不会显示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面具有文本左侧和右侧图像按钮。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码需要你具有名为的位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录中，并且对引用命名空间是包括在内。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Size GetPreferredSize(valuetype System.Drawing.Size proposedSize) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPreferredSize (proposedSize As Size) As Size

param.name: proposedSize
param.span: 控件的自定义大小的区域。

span.span: The custom-sized area for a control.

summary.span: 检索适合控件的矩形区域的大小。

span.span: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.

returns.span: 类型为 的有序对，表示矩形的宽度和高度。

span.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行为不同的控件。The behavior of differs by control. 可能导致无法将返回的大小分配给控件。The might be unable to assign the returned size to the control. 你可以返回大小大于所示的约束`proposedSize`参数，但`proposedSize`会降低随着约束的降低。You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases. 例如，`GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))`不应为宽于`GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`。For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`. 例外情况是`proposedSize`为 0 或`Size.Empty`，其定义为不受约束。The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Image ^ Image { System::Drawing::Image ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Image ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在按钮控件上的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a button control.
The displayed on the button control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置属性，属性将设置为`null`，和属性将设置为其默认值，则为-1。When the property is set, the property will be set to `null`, and the property will be set to its default, -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`，分配给任何映像属性不会显示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面具有文本左侧和右侧图像按钮。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码需要你具有名为的位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录中，并且对引用命名空间是包括在内。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ImageIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮控件上显示的图像的图像列表索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.

value.span: 从零开始的索引，表示 中的图像位置。

span.span: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an .
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当或设置属性，属性设置为其默认值， `null`。When the or properties are set, the property is set to its default value, `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性值更改为`null`、属性返回其默认值，则为-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配内部保留并使用当另一个值对象分配给属性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果新分配给属性具有属性值小于或等于分配给的值，该值减 1 (由于找不到正在从零开始的索引），属性属性值将会调整为一个小于属性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，考虑一个按钮控件具有三个图像和其属性设置为 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果新具有只有两个图像分配给此按钮时，值更改为 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，和设置和属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此代码需要已被创建并至少一个已分配给它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此代码还需要您具有名为的位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值小于 的下限。

span.span: The assigned value is less than the lower bounds of the .

value.span: 如果按钮控件是默认按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the button control is the default button; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，该按钮是为默认按钮。When the property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the . 这意味着如果没有其他按钮按下 ENTER 键或捕获 ENTER 键的其他任何控件具有焦点时，单击该按钮。This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus. 若要指定窗体的默认按钮，设置为所需按钮窗体的属性。To specify the default button of a form, set the property of the form to the desired button.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs kevent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (kevent As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 不要调用如果按钮被禁用 (这包括调用基类的方法重写时派生类中)。Do not call if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's method when you override in a derived class). 禁用的重写中的按钮时，调用基类的方法，然后再禁用此按钮时，或不要根本调用它。When disabling the button in an override of , call the base class's method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，并设置一些其通用的属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面具有文本左侧和右侧图像按钮。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码需要你具有名为的位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录中，并且对引用命名空间是包括在内。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果应使用类来执行兼容版本 1.0 和 1.1 文本呈现。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMnemonic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示前面有 & 符的第一个字符是否用作控件的助记键。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control.

value.span: 如果第一个字符前面加 & (&); 否则为将使用为该控件的助记键。

span.span: if the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseVisualStyleBackColor { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否使用视觉样式（如果支持）绘制背景。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines if the background is drawn using visual styles, if supported.

value.span: 如果要使用视觉样式绘制背景，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的外观的规格了可视样式。Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls. 例如，视觉样式可定义颜色、 大小和字体的控件，而它们使你能够配置以与你的应用程序接口进行协调的可视界面。For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface. 此外，它们提供的所有基于 Windows 的应用程序能够应用的视觉样式的机制。Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.
